attachments.title: How a Designer's 'Peace for Paris' Sketch, Made in Minutes, Became a Global Symbol
attachments.text: Friday's terror attacks in Paris produced an avalanche of empathy online, and proved once again the power of simple images to unite people in times of crisis.
attachments.fallback: AdWeek: How a Designer's 'Peace for Paris' Sketch, Made in Minutes, Became a Global Symbol
